question: My ten year old daughter is about to see a nephrologist about a what looks like a peripelvic renal cyst.  She has has 12 kidney infections in the last few years.  She has flank pain where the cysts is residing. Whatever it is looks like it is connecting into the renal collection system.  What can I expect from a doctor's visit?  Her father has kidney problems and her grandfather is on dialysis.   There is no diabetes in the family.
title: Peripelvic renal cyst
